main.name: Poon Tze Jian / Nicholas
main.bio1: Zealous AI enthusiast specialised in TRAINING and FINE-TUNING models, executing scalable DEPLOYMENTS, and implementing STATE-OF-THE-ART methodologies to transcend the boundaries of AI innovation.
main.bio2: Full-stack developer proficient in software frameworks, tools, and libraries with practical experience.

resume.skillmessage: Some cutting techniques and methods of mine that you might find useful

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence (Hons)
education.description: In group projects, I often take the lead on model training, having successfully completed initiatives across diverse fields, including Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and many other domains.
Accumulated knowledge through detailed lecture explanations and proactive research into unfamiliar concepts.
Possessing a profound understanding of software frameworks, libraries, and concepts gained from in-depth explanation videos and hands-on exercises.
Actively participating in classes and tests equivalent to the JLPT.

work.title: Part time Software Developer
